name: Super Basketball FREE
description:
"Super Basketball FREE" is a great Arcade basketball game!

"Super Basketball FREE" is an simple but very Addictive game which base on realistic physics!
Tap and slide the ball, control its angle and power, then shoot towards the hoop.
The perfect effect and physic effect will help you see more clearly.
The game is an endless arcade game, then shoot towards the hoop to win the levels;
as the difficulty could increases, there are four different random movements for the hoop.
You only have 3 shoots to complete each level!
Are you able to try to sign the best record in the world leaderboard?

HOW TO PLAY:
1. Touch the screen!
2. Drag the ball to change the power and angle!
3. Release to shoot!

HAVE FUN WITH THIS GREAT BASKETBALL GAME! GET IT NOW IT'S TOTALLY FREE!!!
